body.name: Graco Teddi 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib with Bonus Water-Resistant Mattress (Black) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, 2.75-Inch Mattress Included, Convenient Size, Easy 30-Minute Assembly
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 1 min
features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE MINI CRIB: Converts from mini crib to daybed, and twin-size bed with headboard & optional footboard (compatible crib conversion kit sold separately)

INCLUDES BONUS MINI CRIB MATTRESS: Includes bonus 2.75-inch mini crib mattress; Outer cover of mini crib mattress is water-resistant; Both mini crib and mini crib mattress are JPMA Certified; Mini crib mattress made of polyurethane foam

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Equipped with an adjustable mattress support base with 4 different height options; Designed to fit any standard twin-size crib & toddler mattress (mattress sold separately)
JPMA CERTIFIED: Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards
QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with solid pine wood and poplar dowels; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment
body.description: Bring your dream nursery to life with the Graco Teddi 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib. With its clean, modern, and timeless design, the Teddi is the perfect addition to any nursery, and easy to match with any style. The Teddi is crafted with solid pine wood, and its applied finish has been tested to meet or exceed the applicable ASTM and CPSIA safety standards. Also, the Teddi is JPMA Certified — meaning it’s been expert tested by third-party, accredited laboratories to meet or exceed all of the applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards. Designed to adapt to your growing baby, the Teddi is equipped with an adjustable mattress support base with 4 different height options so the mattress support base’s position can be lowered as your child grows [please note, this crib may only be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35 inches (89 cm)]. To support your child’s journey from babyhood through childhood, the Teddi is able to be converted from a mini crib to a daybed, and twin-size bed with headboard and optional footboard (compatible full-size conversion kit sold separately). The Graco Teddi 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib is designed to accommodate any standard twin-size crib & toddler mattress (mattress sold separately). Graco is the proud recipient of the Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval for nursery and children’s bedroom furniture, and the 2022 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture. Backed by a 1-year limited manufacturer’s warranty. Assembly required. Mattress sold separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very impressive little crib. Very easy to assemble. It came with everything I needed to build. For it to be a light weight mini crib it is very sturdy, there’s no wobbling to it. The size is absolutely perfect for a bedroom. We purchased the mini crib because I knew I was putting it in my bedroom next to my bed and it worked out perfectly. I ordered the black mini crib and the color is on point! Love my purchase. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is so nice!
reviews.reviewText: I love Graco brand for most things and this is no different! Nice mini crib for a tight area that you need a crib in or if you just need a mini one for your little who will be sleeping in your room if you plan to breastfeed etc like we plan to do. An upgrade from a bassinet since it’s more sturdy and you don’t have to worry about your baby growing out of it as soon as they learn to sit up. Great quality, perfect size and the mini crib mattress sheets we got fit this well also. Assembly was like your standard crib but easier in my opinion because it isn’t as big! We are very happy with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: The "Graco Teddi 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib - Black, Includes 2.75-inch Mattress" is a cute ;little crib. I like that it fits in my small home well, without taking up too much room. The fact it comes with a waterproof mattress makes this a great value. I have used it for a while now, and not had any issues. Thank You!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a lightweight crib/ small day bed
reviews.reviewText: This crib was easy to put together. It's not too heavy with the option to raise the bed frame up or down. The advertisement for it is a little confusing as I thought I was getting more than just the crib. It's smaller than you think. It's a little wobbly when it's just the day bed but still will work as long as your not rough with it. It does look nice though. I don't think it would be worth it to get the other attachments for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is for sure an upgrade vs. the one we first had for our oldest child.Pros=2 color selection. Probably could use BROWN too.=expandability, once you're done with the crib, you can change to a toddler bed, then finally a larger bed=Award winning=Trusted brand=Actually gives you a mattress with a coverCons=requires the bd conversion kit to convert to the last 2 modes and that is a $120+ purchase. On top of that, the review for them are pretty bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient little crib
reviews.reviewText: I love how small and cute this crib is. We made the mistake of buying a full sized crib for our first child and we used it for maybe a month and the set up was very lengthy. This crib was way easier to set up and didn't take up as much room. It's also convertible and a fraction of the price. It's a win all around. I'm keeping this around for all the kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars awesome solution for limited space!
reviews.reviewText: This Graco crib is so nice and absolutely perfect for my grand baby. It’s smaller than a full size crib, yet there is more than enough room for the baby. It fits into my daughters bedroom perfectly and it looks SO NICE!!!! It’s extremely well made and is the high quality you’d expect from Graco. Fantastic!
